title: Can't join/rejoin LOL anymore.
body:
When I installed LOL  (2 days ago) I had already errors. the client side (before the update) crashed directly. 
I managed to get the working update and I was able to play one game with something weird everywhere I clicked with my right-button I got this little popup box with "print" etc.  
I left the game to restart and rejoin that didnt help at all.

Anyways now I can't play the game anymore :( My GraphicsCard doesn't support DX9 anymore and I get DirectX errors when I try to join/rejoin the game.
This is my "Game - R3d Logs" generated when I press the rejoin button.
https://hastebin.com/reheyoweza.sql

//This is the error I get when I try to join.
http://i.robpizza.nl/lolerror.png

//These are my specs.
http://i.robpizza.nl/specs.png

//Dxdiag.
http://i.robpizza.nl/dxdiag.png

replies.body: Looking over those logs, it does look like Directx was having problems running correctly. That card should still be able to run DX9 afaik, so double check for any updates there and make sure to install them as admin. Let's also run a quick repair through the League client options to check for any damaged or corrupted files.
